MainMenu:
MAIN MENU       

 What would you like to do?
 Type 0 to close application.
 Type 1 to edit fleshcars.
 Type 2 to study.
StackMenu:
What would you like to do?
 Type 0 to close application.
 Type 1 to return to Main Menu.
 Type 2 to create a new stack.
 Type 3 to edit existing stack.
FleshcardMenu:
What would you like to do?
 Type 0 to close application.
 Type 1 to return to the main menu.
 Type 2 to change stack name.
 Type 3 to delete a stack.
 Type 4 to add a flashcard.
 Type 5 to delete a flashcard
 Type 6 to update a flashcard.
StudyMenu:
What would you like to do?
 Type 0 to close application.
 Type 1 to return to main menu.
 Type 2 to start a study session.
 Type 3 to see your stuy sessions.
CreateStackInputName: Input a name for a new Stack
DeleteFlashcardInstruction: Chose ID of the Flashcard you want to delete.
DeleteStackInstruction: Input the ID of Stack you want to delete.
UpdateChoseFlashcard: Chose ID of Flashcard you want to update.
UpdateChoseStack: Input the ID of Stack you want to update.
ChoseStack: Please Chose a Stack by its ID
ChoseFlashCard: Please insert the name of the flashcard
